price: 5. (Nuux) wuxuu yidhi: Rabbiyow! Waxaan qolodeydii ugu baaqay (Towxiid iyo falasho camallo san) habeen iyo maalinba.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِي لَيۡلٗا وَنَهَارٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī daʿawtu qawmī laylan wanahāran
